title: Why do I have to restart my LoL client after waking my pc from sleep
body: Fkn annoying most other games this isn't the case they either don't dc or at least let you reconnect without having to relog.

replies.body: also why does the store close when you need to do anything? like you are browsing the store while in queue ans someone doesn't accept then the store closes. just annoying little things.

Yer while it's annoying to restart after every long idle, but it really doesn't take long to relog anyways,

Depends on your perspective.

However a manual relog without re-opening the client would certainly be a cool thing to have.
